com.Leo.Game

类 River

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Leo.Game.River

  • public class River
extends java.lang.Object
    River class

    The river has the following attributes: the fixed riverLength and width of the riverriverWidth, the location coordinates of the river(x,y), and the river is represented by the image added to the graphical user interface.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    Leo
